0: Man I promise, she's so self conscious
1: She has no idea what she's doing in college
2: That major that she majored in don't make no money
3: But she won't drop out, her parents will look at her funny
4: Now, tell me that ain't insecure
5: The concept of school seems so secure
6: Sophmore three years ain't picked a career
7: She like fuck it, I'll just stay down here and do hair
8: Cause that's enough money to buy her a few pairs of new Airs
9: Cause her baby daddy don't really care
10: She's so precious with the peer pressure
11: Couldn't afford a car so she named her daughter Alexis
12: She had hair so long that it looked like weave
13: Then she cut it all off now she look like Eve
14: And she be dealing with some issues that you can't believe
15: Single black female addicted to retail and well
16: Man I promise, I'm so self conscious
17: That's why you always see me with at least one of my watches
18: Rollies and Pasha's they done drove me crazy
19: I can't even pronounce nothing, pass that versace!
20: Then I spent 400 bucks on this
21: Just to be like nigga you ain't up on this!
22: And I can't even go to the grocery store
23: Without some ones that's clean and a shirt with a team
24: It seems we living the american dream
25: But the people highest up got the lowest self esteem
26: The prettiest people do the ugliest things
27: For the road to riches and diamond rings
28: We shine because they hate us, floss cause they degrade us
29: We trying to buy back our 40 acres
30: And for that paper, look how low we a'stoop
31: Even if you in a Benz, you still a nigga in a coupe
32: I say fuck the police, that's how I treat 'em
33: We buy our way out of jail, but we can't buy freedom
34: We'll buy a lot of clothes but we don't really need em
35: The things we buy to cover up what's inside
36: Cause they made us hate ourself and love they wealth
37: That's why shorties holler, "Where the ballers at?"
38: Drug dealers buy Jordans, crackheads buy crack
39: And the white man get paid off of all of that
40: But I ain't even gonna act holier than thou
41: Cause fuck it, I went to Jacob with 25 thou
45: Cause I wanna be on 106 and Park pushing a Benz
46: I wanna act ballerific like it's all terrific
47: I got a couple past due bills, I won't get specific
48: I got a problem with spending before I get it
49: We all self conscious I'm just the first to admit it
title: All Falls Down (Original)
